text: 🐬..🤔.. kaki bukit recreation centre, workers Dormitory- India's indian banana leaf rice n curry, less expensive n very delicious, the foods are always hot ("panas" n not so spicy) friendly service lots of tables less crowded n plenty of beers .. my favourite indian food n i always use my hand to eat n hv never use fork n spoon - the joy of eating curry with rice  😋 open to public, plenty carpark lots - mostly workers' mini lorries but they are all disciplined drivers with quiet trouble free behaviours .. i like n respect them - they hv 🍻 beers too but very peaceful, even in groups they speaks u cant hear 👂. Imagine, my 3 ladies with me, my wife n 2 grown up baby girls .. imagine, having meals with foriegn workers n no complaints fr my 3 darlings OR .. not, they won't be with me. $6 or $7 a meal ..n at little india ? Not the same. 🦽 wheelchairs moooves easy but share carpark. Vanakum 🙏 🕜am Goodnite 🥱😴.
Very Noisy mee goreng pan knoking by the cook. Very very rude behavier of front counter staff. Pity the foreign workers, who are fated to suffer all this.
Food is decent but 7 dollars for briyani is expensive. Better to ask their price first before buying
The idly here is soo soft and nice
